abstract: The recall of 1-Day Acuvue TruEye does not include soft disposable lenses sold in the United States or other countries under the same brand name.
snippet: The recall of 1-Day Acuvue TruEye does not include soft disposable lenses sold in the United States or other countries under the same brand name.
lead_paragraph: The eye care unit of Johnson & Johnson said on Monday that it was recalling several million disposable soft contact lenses sold primarily in Japan, but also in five other countries in Asia and 19 counties in Europe.

headline.main: Acuvue Contact Lenses Are Recalled in Asia and Europe
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Unit Recalls Millions of Contact Lenses in Asia and Europe
